Generation II.Gold: The Berries it stores in its vase-like shell decompose and become a gooey liquid.
Generation II.Silver: It stores Berries inside its shell. To avoid attacks, it hides beneath rocks and remains completely still.
Generation II.Crystal: The fluid secreted by its toes carves holes in rocks for nesting and can be mixed with Berries to make a drink.
Generation II.Stadium 2: The Berries it stores in its vase like shell decompose and become a gooey liquid. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) It stores Berries inside its shell. To avoid attacks, it hides beneath rocks and remains completely still. (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)

Generation III.Ruby: Shuckle quietly hides itself under rocks, keeping its body concealed inside its hard shell while eating berries it has stored away. The berries mix with its body fluids to become a juice.
